an4.267:1.1: …pe… Attana ca musavadi hoti, paranca musavade samadapeti, musavade ca samanunno hoti, musavadassa ca vannam bhasati—imehi kho …pe….
an4.267:2.1: Attana ca musavada pativirato hoti, paranca musavada veramaniya samadapeti, musavada veramaniya ca samanunno hoti, musavada veramaniya ca vannam bhasati—imehi …pe….
